column4: Hi, I installed Orange Box and Wine, and thw whole thing seems to work fine, but the game is laggy, which is weird because I have quite a decent computer :) my older computer plays Portal better than this one. Anyway. I've read that using DX8 improves performance, but I don't know how to procede. can anyone assist?
in game properties in steam, launch options or something similar, type -dxlevel 81
furuno eclipse blows the socks off netbeans any day of the month
eclipse from the repos has been known to be outdated, install from their site
